resources.string: Bhiwandi Nizampur Nagarpalika College, Bhiwandi derives its nomenclature from the twin citiesâ€”Bhiwandi and Nizampur-also, as it was mainly financed by the then Nagarpalika (the Municipal Corporation); hence, it was named after the prime donor. This institution was founded by the social activists, educationists and political leaders of the 1960s. These leaders and social activists were heterogeneous, representing almost all castes and cadres of society

It gives me immense pleasure to introduce you B.N.N. College, Bhiwandi as the Principal. B.N.N. College, Bhiwandi is celebrating its Golden Jubilee Year in the academic year 2015-16. The college has been a witness of the cultural, social, political, communal and educational development of Bhiwandi city. It has catered higher education to masses and generations.
